1212.content: "How adorable..." He mused from his limo backseat, as he watched Danny in his diaper getting spanked to the point of tears for not eating. He was taking a moment to saver this. The plan was simply and all he had to do was ask Spectra a small favor in setting the wheels in mention. He would wait for the bully boy to break Danny before stepping in and saving the day. From there he'd take Danny home and give him a second-childhood as his wonderful, precious baby boy. The perfect son. He even spent a small fortune on the nursery: silk and satin bedding for a sliver crib. Toys and books everywhere, mother goose figures on the wall which hid Nanny cams. He'd have a fridge stocked with food. The only way out of the room was through Vlad's master bedroom. He could see the two now very happy together as Danny suckled from Vlad's teat for "biddy" from "Papa", holding him on his lap in a gentle, ivory rocking chair. If he was to rebuild the boys mind it was best he be the only one Daniel bonded with. And it would all be his with just a few words. Danny's crying got worse as Dash kept spanking him.

"I see, well Im sure you can finish your project another time. I'm here to give Daniel a ride home." He said picking the boy up from over dashes lap and easily pulling his diaper back up around his waist.
